title: Lassen Volcanic National Park: Warner Valley
body: Warner Valley Campground       The campground is located one mile north of Warner Valley Ranger Station via gravel road and 17 miles north of Chester. Not recommended for trailers. Numerous trailheads are located nearby including: Terminal Geyser, Boiling Springs Lake, Drake Lake, and Devils Kitchen. Nearby Drakesbad Guest Ranch offers dining, horseback riding, massage, and thermal pool swimming. Call ahead for reservations.       Region   Warner Valley     Elevation    5650 feet     Season   6/3/16 - 10/11/16, weather permitting     Reservations   No; first-come, first-served only     Fee   $16      Number of sites   17     Maximum RV length   RVs and trailers not recommended     Maximum trailer length         Accessible Sites         Restrooms   Vault toilets     Water   Potable water     Food storage   Metal food locker     Dump station   Closest station in Chester     Amenities   Closest amenities at Chester     Pets   Permitted (more about pet regulations)     Ranger-led programs   Scheduled programs are offered at the Kohm Yah-mah-nee Visitor Center at the southwest entrance     Phone   Nearest at Drakesbad Guest Ranch     Recreation   Hiking, backpacking, stock use, fishing      Notes  Reservation cards may be posted by the park for park sponsored groups.
